00036 require_once($MODEL_PATH.'model.php');
00037 
00038 class Monitoring extends Model
00039 {
00040     public $LogFile= '/var/log/monitoring.log';
00041     
00042     function Monitoring()
00043     {
00044         parent::Model();
00045     }
00046     
00047     function IsRunning($proc= '')
00048     {
00049         global $MODEL_PATH;
00050         
00051         require_once($MODEL_PATH.'symon.php');
00052         $symon= new Symon();
00053         $retval= $symon->IsRunning();
00054         
00055         require_once($MODEL_PATH.'symux.php');
00056         $symux= new Symux();
00057         $retval&= $symux->IsRunning();
00058         
00059         require_once($MODEL_PATH.'pmacct.php');
00060         $pmacct= new Pmacct();
00061         $retval&= $pmacct->IsRunning();
00062         
00063         return $retval;
00064     }
00065 }
